meanings.definition: Having a weight greater than what is considered normal or healthy.
meanings.sent1: The elephant looked overweighted with all the heavy bags on its back.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised the patient to exercise regularly to avoid becoming overweighted.
meanings.sent3: The overweighted suitcase burst open as soon as it was lifted off the conveyor belt.
meanings.sent4: Her overweighted heart sank when she heard the bad news.
meanings.sent5: The overweighted boat struggled to stay afloat in the rough waters.

meanings.definition: To load or burden with excessive weight.
meanings.sent1: The movers had to be careful not to overweighted the fragile boxes.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overweighted her schedule with too many tasks.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly threatened to overweighted his friend with too many desserts.
meanings.sent4: The guilt overweighted her conscience as she made the difficult decision.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of the project overweighted him, but he managed to complete it successfully.
